attributes.action: recover from Mr Speaker, personally, the entire cost of the failed legal action which used taxpayer money against the interests of the taxpayer in the biggest misuse of public funds on record in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How is it possible for somebody who has himself been accused of 'abusing without breaking any rules' over the use of public funds as expenses for MPs to then have authority to use those same funds in a legal action to prevent the people who are paying these expenses - through the medium of legally enforceable income taxes - seeing how their money is spent. The very idea is preposterous.  Mr Martin should immediately repay to the public purse, the entire cost of his fraudulent legal foray.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
